#### Installation
```bash

```

#### Functions
function|`__doc__`
-|-
`getfiles.getfiles(path)` |return a list of all files in the directory and subdirectories

#### Examples
```python
>>> import getfiles
>>> getfiles.getfiles(".")
[...]
```
